animals.name: Bowsy
animals.description: Bowsy loves to run and jump but broke his leg. He needs reconstructive surgery to get his groove back, please help him

animals.name: Kitten
animals.description: Kitten lost her tail in an errant door slam. I've found a doctor that can surgically attach a faux tail to Kitten's tail stub. She was so proud of her tail. I want her to purr again.

animals.name: Tweeter
animals.description: Tweeter has a strained wing and can't fly anymore. I just can't afford a visit to the vet. Please help

animals.name: Seeker
animals.description: Seeker has terminal cancer. I just want to take him on one last hunting trip. Just one more time to see the birds in Canada

animals.name: Tripod
animals.description: Tripod is my loveable three legged goat. No I don't want another leg for him. It's his birthday and I want to party. Send me some FUN funds.
